model_answer: The on-screen rules like "DON'T WRITE" and "NO CAMERAS" appear at the beginning of the clip, before the narrator starts listing prohibitions and saying he'll leave and be back in 10 days. Therefore, the answer is A: [00:00:06 - 00:02:31].
